component.name: ProtonForge
component.summary: Advanced DLSS & Proton Manager for Steam Games on Linux

description.p: ProtonForge is a powerful Qt6 application designed to give Linux gamers full control over NVIDIA DLSS settings and Proton versions for Steam games. Configure DLSS Super Resolution, Ray Reconstruction, Frame Generation, HDR support, and more - all from a single, intuitive interface.

ul.li: DLSS Configuration: Super Resolution, Ray Reconstruction, Frame Generation
HDR Support: Individual HDR options with smart system detection
Proton Management: Automatic updates for Proton-CachyOS and Proton-GE
Game Launch Integration: Direct launch or Steam integration
Performance Tuning: Frame rate limiting, vsync enhancements
Beautiful Game Library Browser with Steam artwork

description.p: Note: DLSS features require NVIDIA RTX graphics cards (GTX 16xx/RTX 20xx or newer). Proton management features work with any GPU.

screenshot.caption: Main window with game library and DLSS settings
